MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the LL53 postcode areas of Pwllheli and Abersoch, affecting properties in Bwlchtocyn  and surrounding areas. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 08:45AM. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of the extent of the overhead line repairs and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 4PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 11:26AM on 13th April 2021
